oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Light Crust Doughboys - 1936-05-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Light Crust Doughboys radio transcription dated 1936-05-01. Featuring Dick 'Bashful' Reinhart, Bert 'Buddy' Dodson, Clifford 'Doctor' Gross, Kenneth 'Abner' Pitts, Muryel 'Zeke' Campbell, Marvin 'Junior' Montgomery, and announcer Eddie Dunn. Sponsored by Burrus Mill's Light Crust flour.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Light Crust Doughboys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test band of rehearsal -- Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa) -- Opening statement (Eddie Dunn) -- Para Sought's Horn Pipe (Kenneth Pitts fiddle) -- Eddie Dunn talks -- My Pretty Quadroon (Bert Dodson, Dick Reinhart) -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Eddie Dunn) -- Yes Sir, That's My Baby (Marvin Montgomery banjo) -- Eddie Dunn talks -- The Yellow Rose of Texas (Bert Dodson, Dick Reinhart) -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Eddie Dunn) -- Open Up Them Pearly Gates (Clifford Gross) -- Closing statement (Eddie Dunn) -- Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Light Crust Doughboys; KTHS (Radio station : Hot Springs, Ark.); Reinhart, Dick; Montgomery, Marvin; Gross, Clifford; Pitts, Kenneth, 1916-2002; Campbell, Muryel; Dodson, Bert, 1915-1994; Dunn, Eddie, 1896-1951
